price: Sai Muka kãma shi, shĩ da rundunõninsa sai Muka jẽfa su a cikin kõgi. Sai ka dũbi yaddaãƙibar azzãlumai ta kasance.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-ẓālimīna
